function.name: edit
function.description: Perform file operations like viewing, creating, and editing files in the filesystem.

command.description: The file operation to perform: 'view' (show file/dir contents), 'create' (needs file_text), 'str_replace' (needs old_str, new_str), 'insert' (needs insert_line, new_str), or 'undo_edit'.

path.description: Absolute path to the target file or directory. Must start with '/'.

file_text.description: Content to write when creating a new file. Required when command is 'create'.

view_range.description: Two integers [start, end] specifying line numbers for viewing file content. Only valid for 'view' command on files.

old_str.description: String to be replaced in the file. Required when command is 'str_replace' and must appear exactly once in the file.

new_str.description: Replacement string. Required when command is either 'str_replace' or 'insert'.

insert_line.description: Line number where text should be inserted. Required when command is 'insert'. Must be within valid range for the file.
